Name: WaterPressure
Notes: A blue cannon that periodically shoots bubbles that trap the player inside upon contact. It cannot be destroyed through any means. The cannon can be set to rotate towards the player.

Obj_arg0.Name: Cannon Rotation
Obj_arg0.Description: The rotation of the cannon in degrees. Default is 0.

Obj_arg1.Name: Wait Time
Obj_arg1.Description: The time in frames before it starts shooting again. Default is 300.

Obj_arg2.Name: Bubble Speed
Obj_arg2.Description: The movement speed of an individual bubble. Default is 30.

Obj_arg3.Name: Shot Type
Obj_arg3.Description: Specifies how the object shoots bubbles and whether they are affected by gravity or not. Default corresponds to setting it to 0.

Obj_arg7.Name: Disable Popping?
Obj_arg7.Description: If set, the player can't pop the bubble by themself.

SW_APPEAR.Description: The object will appear when this switch is activated.

SW_A.Description: If used, the cannon will be rotated into its shooting position once this switch gets activated. It will be able to shoot bubbles in this state. Once the switch deactivates again, it enters its resting position again.

SW_B.Description: If used, it will only be able to shoot bubbles while this switch is activated.

SW_PARAM.Description: Animations, velocity and update rates are adjusted with ParamScale while this switch is activated.

SW_AWAKE.Description: Enables rendering and resumes updates when this switch is active.

Group.Description: Groups several other WaterPressure instances. The one with the longest wait time becomes the "group leader". All instances will start shooting a bubble once the group leader is ready.

ClippingGroup.Description: Objects in this group are always clipped together.

Camera.Description: Used when the player is trapped inside a bubble.

DemoCast.Description: The object takes part in the cutscene.

Player2Targetable.Description: The bubbles can be targeted, frozen and popped (SMG2 only) by player 2.
